title: Sound On: Biden's 2.25 Trillion Infrastructure Plan
itunes:title: Sound On: Biden's 2.25 Trillion Infrastructure Plan
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis deliver insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: Bloomberg Politics Editor Anna Edgerton, former US Secretary of Transportation Rodney Slater, Partner at Squire Patton Boggs.

To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
